name: Acid Stone
description: Increases ACID damage by 10% and ACID resistance by 15%.

name: Akari War Band
description: Perfect Dodges increase Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 15% for 15s.

name: Alchemy Stone
description: Increases base Lifesteal by 5% while suffering from a negative STATUS or BLIGHT Effect.

name: Alumni Ring
description: Increases all Elemental damage dealt by 10%.

name: Amber Moonstone
description: When the wearer's Health drops below 30%, all incoming damage is reduced by 25% and wearer becomes immune to Temporary Status Effects.

name: Anastasija's Inspiration
description: When receiving healing effects, gain HASTE for 10s.
